Class Execute

java.lang.Object
Execute
public class Execute extends Object
Execute serves as the main controller for the hotel management system, handling various operations such as managing hotels, simulating bookings, and viewing hotel details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clearConsole()
    Clears the console screen.
    void
    execute()
    Executes the main program loop, providing the user with the main menu and options for creating hotels, managing hotels, simulating bookings, viewing hotels, and exiting the program.
    private void
    ManageHotel()
    Manages the hotel-related operations, allowing the user to add rooms, change hotel names, remove rooms, update prices, remove reservations, and remove hotels.
    void
    pressEnterToContinue()
    Prompts the user to press the Enter key to continue.
    private void
    SpecificInformation()
    Provides the user with options to view specific information about hotels, rooms, and reservations.
    private void
    ViewHotel()
    Provides the user with options to view hotel information, including high-level information and specific details about hotels, rooms, and reservations.
